title: Ineffective
report: I have a very severe case of insomnia. (2) Ambien 10mg have a very negligible effect on my getting to sleep. There may be a very fleeting feeling that sleep should occur, but it quickly wears off. I wouldn't call it 'sedation,' just a very mild drowsy feeling. In fact, because Ambien's effects are so short-lived, I can drive and do all normal functioning without any impairment. [Erowid Note: Driving while intoxicated or tripping is dangerous and irresponsible because it endangers other people. Don't do it!]

erowid.citation: BigBrotheriswatching. "Ineffective: experience with Zolpidem (Ambien) (ID 76048)". Erowid.org. Aug 22, 2010. erowid.org/exp/76048
